browser-not-supported.desc:
Please be sure to use one of the following browsers:
  • Chrome
  • Edge
  • Firefox (no private mode!)
  • Opera
  • Safari
browser-not-supported.title: Your browser is not supported

instance-accept.desc: You have initiated a transaction. The costs amount to approximately {evePrice} EVE.
instance-accept.title: Transaction confirmation

instance-delete.desc: Do you want to irrevocably remove this entry?
instance-delete.title: Delete Entry

file-input.description:
Drag your file(s) here to begin
or click to browse

remove-modal.desc: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
remove-modal.title: Delete file

_evan.logout-desc: Are you sure you want to logout?

cancel.desc: Backing up the recovery key is enormously important. Please export or print your recovery key and accept the dialog on the left to continue.
cancel.title: Print recovery key

mnemonic-export.description:
The 12-word recovery key shown here must be securely stored, so that you can access and manage your digital twins and your account at any time.

To log in to the evan.network, you need the recovery key and the password you have chosen beforehand.
mnemonic-export.print-or-store: Print your recovery key and store it offline on a safe place! After you close the window, the recovery key no longer appears.
mnemonic-export.title: Print your Recovery Key

_evan.please-login: Please unlock your Identity to continue.

types.company-desc: Manage company information (register number, company headquarters, ...) and have your company notary verified on the evan.network.
types.device-desc: Save device information and connection settings.

profile-picture.upload-dnd: Click here or drag'n'drop your new picture here.

sharing.description: To share your information with another contact, fill out the form below and click on “Update Sharing Options”

under-development.desc: The area shown is currently under construction and will be available soon.
under-development.title: Under construction
